00034 // sorting algorithm implementation
00036 SortedChunkList::scalarPropCompare::scalarPropCompare( const util::PropMap::pname_type &prop_name ): propertyName( prop_name ) {}
00037 
00038 bool SortedChunkList::posCompare::operator()( const util::fvector4 &posA, const util::fvector4 &posB ) const
00039 {
00040     if ( posA.lexical_less_reverse( posB ) ) { //if chunk is "under" the other - put it there
00041         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Successfully sorted chunks by position (" << posA << " below " << posB << ")";
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044 
00045     return false;
00046 }
00047 bool SortedChunkList::scalarPropCompare::operator()( const isis::util::PropertyValue &a, const isis::util::PropertyValue &b ) const
00048 {
00049     const util::_internal::TypeBase &aScal = *a;
00050     const util::_internal::TypeBase &bScal = *b;
00051 
00052     if ( aScal.lt( bScal ) ) {
00053         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Successfully sorted chunks by " << propertyName << " (" << aScal.toString( false ) << " before " << bScal.toString( false ) << ")";
00054         return true;
00055     } else
00056         return false;
00057 }

00070 SortedChunkList::SortedChunkList( util::PropMap::pname_type fvectorPropName, util::PropMap::pname_type comma_separated_equal_props ):
00071     equalProps( util::string2list<util::PropMap::pname_type>( comma_separated_equal_props, ',' ) )
00072 {}

00075 // low level finding
00076 boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> SortedChunkList::secondaryFind( const util::PropertyValue &key, SortedChunkList::SecondaryMap &map )
00077 {
00078     const SecondaryMap::iterator found = map.find( key );
00079     return found != map.end() ? found->second : boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>();
00080 }
00081 SortedChunkList::SecondaryMap *SortedChunkList::primaryFind( const util::fvector4 &key )
00082 {
00083     const PrimaryMap::iterator found = chunks.find( key );
00084     return found != chunks.end() ? &found->second : NULL;
00085 }

00087 // low level insert
00088 std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> SortedChunkList::secondaryInsert( SecondaryMap &map, const Chunk &ch )
00089 {
00090     util::PropMap::pname_type propName = map.key_comp().propertyName;
00091 
00092     if( ch.hasProperty( propName ) ) {
00093         //check, if there is already a chunk
00094         boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &pos = map[ch.propertyValue( propName )];
00095         bool inserted = false;
00096 
00097         //if not. put oures there
00098         if( !pos ) {
00099             pos.reset( new Chunk( ch ) );
00100             inserted = true;
00101         }
00102 
00103         assert( pos ); // here it must have some content
00104         return std::make_pair( pos, inserted );
00105     } else {
00106         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Cannot insert chunk. It's lacking the property " << util::MSubject( propName ) << " which is needed for primary sorting";
00107         return std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool>( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>(), false );
00108     }
00109 }
00110 std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> SortedChunkList::primaryInsert( const Chunk &ch )
00111 {
00112     LOG_IF( secondarySort.empty(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known secondary sorting left. Chunksort will fail.";
00113     assert( ch.valid() );
00114     // compute the position of the chunk in the image space
00115     // we dont have this position, but we have the position in scanner-space (indexOrigin)
00116     const util::fvector4 &origin = ch.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00117     // and we have the transformation matrix
00118     // [ readVec ]
00119     // [ phaseVec]
00120     // [ sliceVec]
00121     // [ 0 0 0 1 ]
00122     const util::fvector4 &readVec = ch.propertyValue( "readVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00123     const util::fvector4 &phaseVec = ch.propertyValue( "phaseVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00124     util::fvector4 sliceVec;
00125 
00126     if( ch.hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) )
00127         sliceVec = ch.propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00128     else {
00129         sliceVec = util::fvector4(
00130                        readVec[1] * phaseVec[2] - readVec[2] * phaseVec[1],
00131                        readVec[2] * phaseVec[0] - readVec[0] * phaseVec[2],
00132                        readVec[0] * phaseVec[1] - readVec[1] * phaseVec[0]
00133                    );
00134     }
00135 
00136     const util::fvector4 key( origin.dot( readVec ), origin.dot( phaseVec ), origin.dot( sliceVec ), origin[3] );
00137 
00138     // this is actually not the complete transform (it lacks the scaling for the voxel size), but its enough
00139     const scalarPropCompare &secondaryComp = secondarySort.top();
00140 
00141     // get the reference of the secondary map for "key" (create and insert a new if neccessary)
00142     SecondaryMap &subMap = chunks.insert( std::make_pair( key, SecondaryMap( secondaryComp ) ) ).first->second;
00143 
00144     // run insert on that
00145     return secondaryInsert( subMap, ch ); // insert ch into the right secondary map
00146 }
00147 
00148 // high level insert
00149 bool SortedChunkList::insert( const Chunk &ch )
00150 {
00151     LOG_IF( secondarySort.empty(), Debug, error ) << "Inserting will fail without any secondary sort. Use chunks.addSecondarySort at least once.";
00152     LOG_IF( !ch.valid(), Debug, error ) << "You're trying insert an invalid chunk. The missing properties are " << ch.getMissing() << " This will break.";
00153     LOG_IF( !ch.valid(), Debug, error ) << "You should definitively check the chunks validity (use the function Chunk::valid) before calling this funktion.";
00154     assert( ch.valid() );
00155 
00156     if( !empty() ) {
00157         // compare some attributes of the first chunk and the one which shall be inserted
00158         Chunk &first = *( chunks.begin()->second.begin()->second );
00159 
00160         if ( first.sizeToVector() != ch.sizeToVector() ) { // if they have different size - do not insert
00161             LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00162                     << "Ignoring chunk with different size. (" << ch.sizeToString() << "!=" << first.sizeToString() << ")";
00163             return false;
00164         }
00165 
00166         BOOST_FOREACH( util::PropMap::pname_type & ref, equalProps ) { // check all properties which where given to the constructor of the list
00167             // if at least one of them has the property and they are not equal - do not insert
00168             if ( ( first.hasProperty( ref ) || ch.hasProperty( ref ) ) && first.propertyValue( ref ) != ch.propertyValue( ref ) ) {
00169                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00170                         << "Ignoring chunk with different " << ref << ". (" << ch.propertyValue( ref ) << "!=" << first.propertyValue( ref ) << ")";
00171                 return false;
00172             }
00173         }
00174     } else {
00175         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Inserting 1st chunk";
00176         std::stack<scalarPropCompare> backup = secondarySort;
00177 
00178         while( !ch.hasProperty( secondarySort.top().propertyName ) ) {
00179             const util::PropMap::pname_type temp = secondarySort.top().propertyName;
00180 
00181             if ( secondarySort.size() > 1 ) {
00182                 secondarySort.pop();
00183             } else {
00184                 LOG( Debug, warning )
00185                         << "First chunk is missing the last secondary sort-property fallback (" << util::MSubject( temp ) << "), won't insert.";
00186                 secondarySort = backup;
00187                 return false;
00188             }
00189         }
00190 
00191         LOG( Debug, info )  << "Using " << secondarySort.top().propertyName << " for secondary sorting, determined by the first chunk";
00192     }
00193 
00194     const util::PropMap::pname_type &prop2 = secondarySort.top().propertyName;
00195 
00196     std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> inserted = primaryInsert( ch );
00197 
00198     LOG_IF( inserted.first && !inserted.second, Debug, verbose_info )
00199             << "Not inserting chunk because there is allready a Chunk at the same position (" << ch.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) << ") with the equal property "
00200             << std::make_pair( prop2, ch.propertyValue( prop2 ) );
00201 
00202     LOG_IF(
00203         inserted.first && !inserted.second &&
00204         ch.hasProperty( "source" ) && inserted.first->hasProperty( "source" ) &&
00205         !( ch.propertyValue( "source" ) == inserted.first->propertyValue( "source" ) ),
00206         Debug, verbose_info )
00207             << "The conflicting chunks where " << ch.propertyValue( "source" ).toString( false ) << " and " << inserted.first->propertyValue( "source" ).toString( false );
00208 
00209     return inserted.second;
00210 }
00211 
00212 void SortedChunkList::addSecondarySort( const util::PropMap::pname_type &cmp )
00213 {
00214     secondarySort.push( scalarPropCompare( cmp ) );
00215 }
00216 bool SortedChunkList::empty()const
00217 {
00218     return chunks.empty() || chunks.begin()->second.empty(); // if there is no subMap or nothing in the first subMap ... its empty
00219 }
00220 void SortedChunkList::clear()
00221 {
00222     chunks.clear();
00223 }
00224 bool SortedChunkList::isRectangular()
00225 {
00226     if( empty() )return true;
00227 
00228     size_t images = getHorizontalSize();
00229     BOOST_FOREACH( PrimaryMap::reference outer, chunks ) {
00230         if( outer.second.size() != images )
00231             return false;
00232     }
00233     return true;
00234 }
00235 size_t SortedChunkList::getHorizontalSize()
00236 {
00237     if( empty() )return 0;
00238     else return chunks.begin()->second.size();
00239 }
00240 
00241 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > SortedChunkList::getLookup()
00242 {
00243     LOG_IF( !isRectangular(), Debug, error ) << "Running getLookup on an non rectangular chunk-list is not defined";
00244 
00245     if( !empty() ) {
00246         PrimaryMap::iterator iP = chunks.begin();
00247         const size_t horizontal = chunks.size();
00248         const size_t vertical = iP->second.size();
00249         std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > ret( horizontal * vertical );
00250 
00251         for( size_t h = 0; h < horizontal; h++, iP++ ) { // outer loop iterates horizontaly (through the primary sorting)
00252             assert( iP != chunks.end() );
00253             SecondaryMap::iterator iS = iP->second.begin();
00254 
00255             for( size_t v = 0; v < vertical; v++, iS++ ) { // inner loop iterates verticaly (through the secondary sorting)
00256                 assert( iS != iP->second.end() );
00257                 ret[h+v *horizontal] = iS->second; // insert horizontally - primary sorting is the fastest running index (read the sorting matrix horizontaly)
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261         return ret;
00262     } else
00263         return std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > >();
00264 }
00265 
00266 void SortedChunkList::transform( chunkPtrOperator &op )
00267 {
00268     BOOST_FOREACH( PrimaryMap::reference outer, chunks ) {
00269         BOOST_FOREACH( SecondaryMap::reference inner, outer.second ) {
00270             inner.second = op( inner.second );
00271         }
00272     }
00273 }
